name: The New Teacher - New Female Teacher at Delinquent High!
name_original: The New Teacher - New Female Teacher at Delinquent High!
description:
Hi, welcome!

Great that you found this game! It's fate that draws you here to this visual novel! This is a short, super fun interactive novel with mini-games embedded! 

This is not your normal teaching scenario. In the delinquent high school, you must navigate the treacherous antics of rebellious teens, office drama, lesson prep, and much more! 

Open the game in your browser with one "click" and enjoy immediate gameplay! Contained within are:

  • detailed and ornate images 🥰
  • lively characters 💃
  • amazing, creative gameplay 😍
  • multiple branches 🥳
  • point accumulation system 🤑
  • mini-games 😲
  • elaborate, lifelike scenarios 🤯
  • exhilarating choices 🤌🏼
  • crazy easter eggs (you can burn down the school🔥) 😮
